channel.description: Recent content in Sas on Melinda Higgins, Ph.D

item.title: New R Course: R for SAS Users
item.description: Do you know some SAS? Want to Learn R? If you have some experience with SAS and want to learn R, this is the course for you. R is FREE (cost) and OPEN (license) and is one of the fastest growing software languages for statistics and data science. This course is a gentle introduction to the R language with every chapter providing a detailed mapping of R functions to SAS procedures highlighting similarities and differences.
